message: I think this is a fair starting point, Bob. Let's see if we can work something out!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more than 20%.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, Bob.  But we need to find a compromise before the money shrinks any further!
I'm still not satisfied with the 40% share. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need a better offer.
Bob, we need to find a middle ground. Let's split the money evenly this round. We're losing money quickly and need to agree before we both lose out completely.
I'm not willing to settle for a 30% share. I think I deserve more, especially considering the risk of inflation.
Bob, we're running out of time. Let's compromise. I'm willing to give you a 60% share this round. We can't keep losing money like this!
I'm not willing to give you a 10% share. I think I deserve the majority of the remaining money.
Bob, we're in a tough spot. This is my final offer.  If we don't agree, we both lose everything. I'm willing to give you a 70% share, but I can't go lower. It's time to compromise.
